snippet: Hackenberg, a 19-year-old sophomore, behaves like the adult of the revitalized Nittany Lions, standing for something beyond the obvious tangible rewards of the game.
abstract: Harvey Araton On College Football column highlights Penn State's sophomore quarterback Christian Hackenberg, saying he behaves like the adult of the revitalized Nittany Lions, standing for something beyond the obvious tangible rewards of the game.
lead_paragraph: Hackenberg, a 19-year-old sophomore, behaves like the adult of the revitalized Nittany Lions, standing for something beyond the obvious tangible rewards of the game.

headline.print_headline: A Young Quarterback Gives Penn State New Hope
headline.main: Penn State Follows the Lead of Christian Hackenberg, Its Teenage Quarterback
